text: Ithihasam (English: History) is a 1981 Indian Malayalam film, directed by Joshiy. The film was remade in Tamil as Theerpu and in Hindi as Itihaas. ==Cast== * Prem Nazir as Commissioner Gopalakrishnan * Srividya as Lakshmi * Jose Prakash as Alexander * Sukumaran as Vijayan * Jalaja as Rani * M. G. Soman as Rajan * Sumalatha as Shobha * Jagathy Sreekumar as Kunjappan * Balan K. Nair as Thankappan * Prathapachandran as Judge * Master Suresh * Janardanan as Lawyer * Sathya Chithra Valsala * Thodupuzha Radhakrishnan ==References== ==External links== * Category:1981 films Category:Indian films Category:1980s Malayalam-language films Category:Films directed by Joshiy Category:Malayalam films remade in other languages
title: Ithihasam
